data.scheme_name: Karnataka Startup Scheme 2022-2027 - Reimbursement of SGST - Existing
data.benefits: Scheme provides 100% reimbursement of annual State GST (SGST), within first three years of being incubated.
data.eligibility: Startups which are recognized by Department for Promotion of Industry and Internal Trade (DPIIT) are eligible under the scheme.
data.conditions:
Entity must be registered with Karnataka Startup Cell under Karnataka Innovation& Technology Society (KITS), Department of Electronics, IT, Bt and S&T, GoK as a Startup.
The applicant should be a outside Bengaluru startup.
The applicant should be incubated in GoK supported incubators and CIFs with a maximum annual turnover of Rs 100 lakhs.
 If the applicant exceed the turnover criteria in any one of the three years they shall be ineligible for reimbursement.
data.beneficiaries: Startups which are recognized by Department for Promotion of Industry and Internal Trade (DPIIT) are eligible under the scheme.
data.prerequisites:
Entity must be registered with Karnataka Startup Cell under Karnataka Innovation& Technology Society (KITS), Department of Electronics, IT, Bt and S&T, GoK as a Startup.
The applicant should be a outside Bengaluru startup.
The applicant should be incubated in GoK supported incubators and CIFs with a maximum annual turnover of Rs 100 lakhs.
 If the applicant exceed the turnover criteria in any one of the three years they shall be ineligible for reimbursement.
data.nodal_agency:
Karnataka Innovation and Technology Society (KITS)
Karnataka Startup Cell
data.context: To play a vital role in creating an enabling environment across the State for nurturing startups throughout their business lifecycle and make Karnataka a global innovation hub for startups.
data.objective: The main aim is to strengthen government institutions and support emerging clusters outside Bengaluru, foster innovation and entrepreneurship skills in students, promote the growth of startups  facilitate technology solutions for social challenges, and improve funding avenues for startups through various means including government support.
data.description: Beyond Bengaluru Startups, incubated in Government of Karnataka supported incubators and CIF ( Central Implementation Facilities) with a maximum annual turnover of Rs 100 Lakhs shall be eligible for 100% reimbursement of annual State GST (SGST), within first three years of being incubated.
data.how_to_apply: Startups have to register on Karnataka Startup portal ( Karnataka Startup Cell) and then they can fill Annexure as per requiremnts for benefits from Karnataka Statup Portal.
data.funding_mechanism: Amount will be disbursed to the beneficiary after approval of the application by the concerned authority.
data.checklist_info_a:
KYC 
DPIIT
Incorporationn certificate
Karnataka Startup Certificate
Detailed Project report
Proper proof of concept for product/service
